fields.original_string: private static final int MAX_THREAD_POOL_SIZE = MIN_THREAD_POOL_SIZE * 2;
private ExecutorService executor = new ThreadPoolExecutor(MIN_THREAD_POOL_SIZE, MAX_THREAD_POOL_SIZE, 5, TimeUnit.MINUTES, new LinkedBlockingQueue<>());
fields.declarator: executor = new ThreadPoolExecutor(MIN_THREAD_POOL_SIZE, MAX_THREAD_POOL_SIZE, 5, TimeUnit.MINUTES, new LinkedBlockingQueue<>())
